name: Brackeys Jam 2020.2
description:
This game is not good. There is no gameplay. You just walk from piont A to B.

:/  Yeah, it is a waste of time. The art is so bad, that you can´t even tell what is going on.

If you are ready to play the worst game ever,  then welcome to my first Game Jam!!! 

But I had a lot of fun doing this.
